caption:
“Go forth, for the world awaits the faithful.”

Reflection:
The call is not to retreat but to reveal. Carry the light you’ve found into every shadow.

Commentary:
This closing reflection commissions the pilgrim to mission. Faith fulfilled is faith shared — walking onward, bearing the eternal flame.
